plot: Jacobo is a good guy, but he is unhappy. Girls blow him off and his godfather is bastard. He has only one way out to be loved: Turn into one of The Bad Guys, just as his godfather.
title: El sobrino
plot_es: Jacobo is a good guy, but he is unhappy. Girls blow him off and his godfather is bastard. He has only one way out to be loved: Turn into one of The Bad Guys, just as his godfather.
plot_en: Jacobo is a good guy, but he is unhappy. Girls blow him off and his godfather is bastard. He has only one way out to be loved: Turn into one of The Bad Guys, just as his godfather.
